qDef.qDef:
=Num
(
    Pick
    (
     $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
        ,//MT
    	Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Invoice MT])
        ,//Amount
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
        /1000    
        ,//COP
        (
            (
              Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
              -Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
            )
        )/1000
        ,// ASP/MT 
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
        /
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Invoice MT])
        ,// COP/MT
      	(
            (
              Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
              -Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
            )
        )
        /
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Invoice MT])
        , //Customer Count
        count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}[Customer])
        , // Country Count
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct([Geographical Country]))
         ,// Building Block
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct ([Building Block Level1]))
         ,//Salesman
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct(Salesman))
      

    )
    ,
    Text
    (
      Pick
      (
          $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
          ,//MT
          'MT '&'#,##0'
          ,//Amount
          'SLS '& '#,##0'
          ,//COP
          'COP '& '#,##0'
          ,// ASPMT 
           'ASPMT '&'#,##0'
          ,// COPMT
           'COPMT '&'#,##0'
          , //Customer Count
           '#,##0' &' Cust'
          , // Country Count
          'Country '& '#,##0'
          ,// Building Block
         '#,##0'  &' BB'
          ,//Salesman
         '#,##0'  &' Salesman'


      )
   )
   , '.' , ',' )

Num
(
    Pick
    (
     $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
        ,//MT
    	Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Invoice MT])
        ,//Amount
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
        /1000    
        ,//COP
        (
            (
              Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
              -Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
            )
        )/1000
        ,// ASP/MT 
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
        /
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Invoice MT])
        ,// COP/MT
      	(
            (
              Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
              -Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
            )
        )
        /
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Invoice MT])
        , //Customer Count
        count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}[Customer])
        , // Country Count
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct([Geographical Country]))
         ,// Building Block
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct ([Building Block Level1]))
         ,//Salesman
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct(Salesman))
      

    )
    ,
    Text
    (
      Pick
      (
          $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
          ,//MT
          'MT '&'#,##0'
          ,//Amount
          'SLS '& '#,##0'
          ,//COP
          'COP '& '#,##0'
          ,// ASPMT 
           'ASPMT '&'#,##0'
          ,// COPMT
           'COPMT '&'#,##0'
          , //Customer Count
           '#,##0' &' Cust'
          , // Country Count
          'Country '& '#,##0'
          ,// Building Block
         '#,##0'  &' BB'
          ,//Salesman
         '#,##0'  &' Salesman'


      )
   )
   , '.' , ',' )

Num
(
    Pick
    (
     $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
        ,//MT
    	Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Invoice MT])
        ,//Amount
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
        /1000    
        ,//COP
        (
            (
              Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
              -Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
            )
        )/1000
        ,// ASP/MT 
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
        /
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter),[Business Unit Segment]={'B2C'}>} [Invoice MT])
        ,// COP/MT
      	(
            (
              Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
              -Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter), [Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))}>} [Invoice Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate])
            )
        )
        /
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Invoice MT])
        , //Customer Count
        count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}[Customer])
        , // Country Count
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct([Geographical Country]))
         ,// Building Block
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct ([Building Block Level1]))
         ,//Salesman
         count({$<[Sales Type] = {'Net Sales'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}distinct(Salesman))
      

    )
    ,
    Text
    (
      Pick
      (
          $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
          ,//MT
          'MT '&'#,##0'
          ,//Amount
          'SLS '& '#,##0'
          ,//COP
          'COP '& '#,##0'
          ,// ASPMT 
           'ASPMT '&'#,##0'
          ,// COPMT
           'COPMT '&'#,##0'
          , //Customer Count
           '#,##0' &' Cust'
          , // Country Count
          'Country '& '#,##0'
          ,// Building Block
         '#,##0'  &' BB'
          ,//Salesman
         '#,##0'  &' Salesman'


      )
   )
   , '.' , ',' )

Num
(
    Pick
    (
     $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
        ,//MT
    	Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Budget MT])
        ,//Amount
       	Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}[Budget Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate])  /1000    
        ,//COP
        (
        	Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter)>}[Budget Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
         	-Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter)>}[Budget Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
		)/1000
        ,// ASP/MT 
     	Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>}[Budget Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
     	/ 
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Budget MT])
        ,// COP/MT
      	(
        	Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter)>}[Budget Amount USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
      		-Sum({$<[Sales Type]={'Budget'},[Currency Sorting Key]={$(=MaxString([Currency Sorting Key]))},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter)>}[Budget Cost USD]*[Currency Average Rate]) 
		)
      	/
        Sum({$<[Sales Type] = {'Budget'},$(v_B2C_Sales_Filter),$(v_Neutralize_Filter)>} [Budget MT])
        , //Customer Count
        0
        , // Country Count
        0
         ,// Building Block
        0
         ,//Salesman
        0
      

    )
    ,
    Text
    (
      Pick
      (
          $(v_Selected_Measure_One)
          ,//MT
          'MT '&'#,##0'
          ,//Amount
          'Amt '& '#,##0'
          ,//COP
          'COP '& '#,##0'
          ,// ASPMT 
           'ASPMT '&'#,##0'
          ,// COPMT
           'COPMT '&'#,##0'
          , //Customer Count
           '#,##0' &' Cust'
          , // Country Count
          'Country '& '#,##0'
          ,// Building Block
         '#,##0'  &' BB'
          ,//Salesman
         '#,##0'  &' Salesman'


      )
   )
   , '.' , ',' )
